long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you the option for all links in a tab to open in a new tab. When enabled (shown by a green icon), every link will open in a new tab. When disabled (black icon), links will open as they would by default.
